fullText:
Dazing Fist

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, monk, Stone Fist class feature
Benefit: When you hit an enemy with a daily attack power, you also daze the enemy (save ends). If the attack already dazes the enemy, it instead deals 5 extra damage.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 136.
